arts.ttl: Barca's latest attacking blow could lead to 17-year-old leading the line against Girona
arts.sum: Barcelona confirm that Ferran Torres will miss Saturday's La Liga clash with Girona, which could open the door for 17-year-old Toni Fernandez to lead the line.
